alfredsnippet.snippet:
Milne, E. A., Albert Einstein: Philosopher-Scientist, edited by Paul Arthur Schilpp, The Library of Living Philosophers, Evanston, Ill., 1949, p.435

E. A. Milne's comments are of interest in this connection. General Relativity, he says,

"in the writer's opinion, is of a nature alien to the main tradition in mathematical physics."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - General Relativity as Alien to the Main Tradition
